query:
-- Grunddaten (wie taskTemplates)
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN slug VARCHAR(255) AFTER uniqueId,
ADD COLUMN title VARCHAR(255) AFTER name,
ADD COLUMN shortDescription VARCHAR(500) AFTER description;

-- Kategorisierung
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN categoryId INT AFTER shortDescription,
ADD COLUMN businessAreaId INT AFTER categoryId;

-- Visuell
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN icon VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'FileText' AFTER businessAreaId,
ADD COLUMN color VARCHAR(20) AFTER icon;

-- Variablen-Schema (JSON)
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN variableSchema JSON AFTER color;

-- Erweiterte Einstellungen
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN estimatedTimeSavings INT AFTER variableSchema,
ADD COLUMN creditCost INT DEFAULT 1 AFTER estimatedTimeSavings,
ADD COLUMN llmModel VARCHAR(100) AFTER creditCost,
ADD COLUMN llmTemperature DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 0.70 AFTER llmModel,
ADD COLUMN maxTokens INT AFTER llmTemperature,
ADD COLUMN outputFormat ENUM('markdown', 'json', 'text', 'html') DEFAULT 'markdown' AFTER maxTokens,
ADD COLUMN exampleOutput TEXT AFTER outputFormat;

-- Dokument-Anforderungen
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN documentRequired INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER exampleOutput,
ADD COLUMN documentCount INT DEFAULT 1 AFTER documentRequired,
ADD COLUMN allowedFileTypes JSON AFTER documentCount,
ADD COLUMN maxFileSize INT DEFAULT 10485760 AFTER allowedFileTypes,
ADD COLUMN maxPages INT AFTER maxFileSize,
ADD COLUMN documentRelevanceCheck INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER maxPages,
ADD COLUMN documentDescription TEXT AFTER documentRelevanceCheck;

-- Masking-Einstellungen
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN maskingRequired INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER documentDescription,
ADD COLUMN maskingTypes JSON AFTER maskingRequired,
ADD COLUMN autoMasking INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER maskingTypes;

-- Keywords
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN keywords JSON AFTER autoMasking;

-- Marketing & SEO
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN marketingEnabled INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER keywords,
ADD COLUMN marketingHeadline VARCHAR(100) AFTER marketingEnabled,
ADD COLUMN marketingSubheadline VARCHAR(200) AFTER marketingHeadline,
ADD COLUMN marketingUsps JSON AFTER marketingSubheadline,
ADD COLUMN marketingCtaText VARCHAR(50) AFTER marketingUsps,
ADD COLUMN marketingMetaDescription VARCHAR(160) AFTER marketingCtaText,
ADD COLUMN marketingKeywords JSON AFTER marketingMetaDescription;

-- Autor-Tracking
ALTER TABLE customSuperprompts 
ADD COLUMN createdByName VARCHAR(255) AFTER createdBy,
ADD COLUMN lastModifiedByName VARCHAR(255) AFTER createdByName,
ADD COLUMN templateVersion VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '1.0' AFTER lastModifiedByName,
ADD COLUMN changeLog TEXT AFTER templateVersion;
